Dialogue.Value: I was a field medic in the,combat zone in Arabstan.,One day，I received word
that a team of mercenaries,had been annihilated，and I,went to rescue any survivors.
There was only one survivor.,It was that girl....Reisen.
When I saw the hollow look,in her eyes as she pointed,her empty gun at me....
I was shocked. I couldn’t,believe there was something,so cruel in this world....
I protected Reisen so that,she could live a normal life....
And I tried to live with her as,my daughter here in Japan.
